Description: On I-64 at mile marker 125 in the County of Albemarle, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On Rt. 629 East in the County of Brunswick, in the vicinity of Waqua Creek Rd; Rt. 630N/S (Brunswick County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water.
Label: Minor Incident - Standing Water - Advisory

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 164.2 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 153 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
